ModMetaData.name: [1.1] Better Speed
ModMetaData.author: Fumblesneeze
ModMetaData.description:
Tweaks speed settings and adds a new carry weight penalty mechanic to make the game playable on 1x and 2x speeds.
- Pawns walk faster - Pawns shoot faster - Doors open faster - Carrying stuff will slow pawns down
Update 5: -1.1 Update -Fixed how pawn carrying is calculated
Update 4: -1.0 Update -Fixed how mass is calculated
Update 3: - B18 Update
Update 2: - Fix Flash to the Rescue! bug
Update 1: - A17 update - Animals will have half of the carry penalty applied to them at all times
All the settings are customizable in the game using the mod settings.
Requires HugsLib to be installed and loaded previously.
Made using Harmony.
Icon 'Stopwatch' By Gregor Cresnar (The Noun Project)
